observationText: Mice with astroglial inactivation of the Nf1 tumor suppressor gene (Nf1 flox/flox; GFAP-Cre mice) developed low-grade astrocytomas with 100% penetrance, detected as early as 3 months of age, and exhibited progressive neurological dysfunction with advanced age.
In the Nf1flox/mut; GFAP-Cre model, Nf1 inactivation occurs in neuroglial progenitors at around embryonic day 14.5.
